data.actual_result: Games sections change width after you tab out of and back into the activity tab
data.expected_result: Game sections should change width when zoom level is changed
data.short_description: Game sections under the "What's New" in activity tab don't adjust for changing zoom level while in the activity tab
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to the "What's New" section of the activity tab on 100 zoom and observe the size of the game sections (they should be in two columns in 100 zoom) - Change your zoom level to 125 zoom without leaving the activity tab and then observe the game sections again - Without changing zoom level, tab into a random server and back into the activity tab - Scroll down to the "What's New" section and observe the game sections (they should be in one column) - Change your zoom level to 100 without leaving the activity tab and observe the game sections again
